channel.title: Statistical Analysis on Kunmo Kim
channel.description: Recent content in Statistical Analysis on Kunmo Kim

item.title: Precursor ISI Cancellation Sliding-Block DFE for High-Speed Wireline Receivers
item.description: In this paper, we propose a feed-forward nonlinear equalizer capable of canceling both pre-cursor and post-cursor ISI in an ADC-based wireline receiver system.

item.title: Accurate Statistical BER Analysis of DFE Error Propagation in the Presence of Residual ISI
item.description: We investigate an accurate statistical modeling and analysis methodology for DFE error propagation in the presence of residual ISI.
